<table-wrap id="tbl1" orientation="portrait" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>Crystallographic Data for Pyrazinyl-Substituted Diaminotriazine <bold>2</bold> and Pyrimidinyl-Substituted Diaminotriazine <bold>3</bold>
</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup align="left" cols="3">
<oasis:colspec colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center"></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<bold>2</bold>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<bold>3</bold>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>formula</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>C<sub>7</sub>H<sub>7</sub>N<sub>7</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>C<sub>7</sub>H<sub>7</sub>N<sub>7</sub>
</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>cryst syst</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>monoclinic</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>tetragonal</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>space group</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">P</italic>2<sub>1</sub>/<italic toggle="yes">n</italic>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">P</italic>4<sub>3</sub>2<sub>1</sub>2</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">a</italic> (Å)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>9.0902(6)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>7.8000(2)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">b</italic> (Å)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>6.8526(4)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>7.8000(2)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">c</italic> (Å)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>12.9990(8)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>13.6369(3)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>α (deg)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>90</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>90</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>β (deg)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>103.304(3)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>90</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>γ (deg)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>90</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>90</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">V</italic> (Å<sup>3</sup>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>788.00(9)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>829.67(4)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">Z</italic>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>4</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>4</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>ρ<sub>calcd</sub> (g cm<sup>−3</sup>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.595</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.515</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">T</italic> (K)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>150</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>150</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>μ (mm<sup>−1</sup>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.936</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.889</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>1</sub>, <italic toggle="yes">I</italic> > 2σ(<italic toggle="yes">I</italic>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0359</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0274</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>
<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>1</sub>, all data</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0423</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0274</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>ω<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>2</sub>, <italic toggle="yes">I</italic> > 2σ(<italic toggle="yes">I</italic>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.1021</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0735</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>ω<italic toggle="yes">R</italic>
<sub>2</sub>, all data</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.1178</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>0.0735</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>measured reflns</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>16462</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>17296</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>independent reflns</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1481</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>789</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>observed reflns, <italic toggle="yes">I</italic> > 2σ(<italic toggle="yes">I</italic>)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1283</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>787</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 1. Crystallographic Data for Pyrazinyl-Substituted Diaminotriazine 2 and Pyrimidinyl-Substituted Diaminotriazine 3

|              | 2              | 3              |
|--------------|----------------|----------------|
| formula      | C<sub>7</sub>H<sub>7</sub>N<sub>7</sub> | C<sub>7</sub>H<sub>7</sub>N<sub>7</sub> |
| cryst syst   | monoclinic     | tetragonal     |
| space group  | P2<sub>1</sub>/n | P4<sub>3</sub>2<sub>1</sub>2 |
| a (Å)        | 9.0902(6)      | 7.8000(2)      |
| b (Å)        | 6.8526(4)      | 7.8000(2)      |
| c (Å)        | 12.9990(8)     | 13.6369(3)    |
| α (deg)      | 90             | 90             |
| β (deg)      | 103.304(3)    | 90             |
| γ (deg)      | 90             | 90             |
| V (Å<sup>3</sup>) | 788.00(9) | 829.67(4)     |
| Z            | 4              | 4              |
| ρ<sub>calcd</sub> (g cm<sup>−3</sup>) | 1.595 | 1.515 |
| T (K)        | 150            | 150            |
| μ (mm<sup>−1</sup>) | 0.936  | 0.889  |
| R<sub>1</sub>, I > 2σ(I) | 0.0359 | 0.0274 |
| R<sub>1</sub>, all data | 0.0423 | 0.0274 |
| ωR<sub>2</sub>, I > 2σ(I) | 0.1021 | 0.0735 |
| ωR<sub>2</sub>, all data | 0.1178 | 0.0735 |
| measured reflns | 16462    | 17296    |
| independent reflns | 1481 | 789 |
| observed reflns, I > 2σ(I) | 1283 | 787 |
